sentences.sContent: Dear athletes, remember that you are role models for the Youth of the World. Reject doping and cheating.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dear athletes, remember that you are role models for the Youth of the World. Reject doping and cheating.
sentences.sCn: 亲爱的运动员们，请记住，你们是世界青年的楷模，请拒绝兴奋剂，向作弊说不。
